mapper.insert: insert into SuiteMember (id, password, name, tel, role, create_at, update_at) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{role}, sysdate(), sysdate())
mapper.select: select count(*) from SuiteMember where id = #{id}
select id, password, role from SuiteMember where id = #{id} and role in (#{role}, 'A');
select password from suitemember where id = #{id};
